name: VZDiskImageSynchronizationMode
desc: An integer that describes the disk image synchronization mode.

items.name: case full
items.desc: Synchronizes data to the permanent storage holding the disk image.

items.name: case fsync
items.desc: Synchronizes data to the drive using the systemâ€™s best-effort synchronization mode.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Disables data synchronization with the permanent storage.
